text:
Hi all - I know many of us are not-so-creative writers, and in an effort to explore and develop that part of my skill set, I just signed up for this free 3-session creative writing workshop. It starts today and I thought I would share it with everyone!

From the page: _"Over three days you’ll try several different writing practices that get you into this special state of mind where the magic happens. Then we’ll investigate the eight elements of the flow state, and I’ll show you how you can build them into your own writing practice."_

<https://find-the-flow.sarahseleckywritingschool.com/>

elements.text:
Hi all - I know many of us are not-so-creative writers, and in an effort to explore and develop that part of my skill set, I just signed up for this free 3-session creative writing workshop. It starts today and I thought I would share it with everyone!

From the page:

"Over three days you’ll try several different writing practices that get you into this special state of mind where the magic happens. Then we’ll investigate the eight elements of the flow state, and I’ll show you how you can build them into your own writing practice."
